name: 李瑞元
objective: 本課程內容包括以分子熱力學的觀點來推導狀態方程式與活性係數模式，及有關相平衡的應用，統計熱力學原理亦將一併介紹。
schedule:
Ch 1. Introduction
Ch 2. The first law and other basic concepts
Ch 3. Volumetric properties of pure fluids
Ch 4. Heat effects
Ch 5. The second law of thermodynamics
Ch 6. Thermodynamic properties of fluids
Ch 7. Applications of thermodynamics to flow processes
Ch 8. Production of power from heat
Ch 9. Refrigeration and liquefaction
Ch 10. The framework of solution thermodynamics
Ch 11. Mixing processes
Ch 12. Phase equilibrium: Introduction
Ch 13. Thermodynamic formulations for vapor/liquid equilibrium
materials: JM Smith, HC Van Ness, MM Abbott, MT Swihart. Introduction to Chemical Engineering Thermodynamics, 8th Edition. McGraw Hill Education 2018.
